Hello! My name is Destiny Niesi and I am from Nigeria, Benin City. I enjoy playing the piano and beatbuzzing😊

Nigeria, Benin City

Benin City, the capital of Edo State in Nigeria, is known for its rich cultural heritage and historical significance as the former capital of the Benin Kingdom.

The city is famous for its exquisite bronze artifacts and traditional craftsmanship. Vibrant markets and lively traditional festivals reflect the city's dynamic community and culture. Benin City's renowned artifacts were referenced in the first Black Panther movie, highlighting its rich cultural significance and artistry.
